meanings.definition: The state of being below the level of literacy.
meanings.sent1: Subliteracy can make it hard to read simple sentences.
meanings.sent2: Her subliteracy prevented her from understanding the instructions.
meanings.sent3: The cat's subliteracy was evident when it tried to read a book upside down.
meanings.sent4: In a world of books, his subliteracy was like being lost in a maze without a map.
meanings.sent5: The teacher worked hard to help the student overcome their subliteracy.

meanings.definition: A lack of basic reading and writing skills.
meanings.sent1: Subliteracy can be improved with practice and patience.
meanings.sent2: His subliteracy made it challenging for him to fill out job applications.
meanings.sent3: The subliteracy of the chicken was evident when it tried to write a letter with its beak.
meanings.sent4: Her subliteracy was a barrier to expressing herself fully through writing.
meanings.sent5: The community center offers classes to help adults overcome subliteracy.
